project.name: C-C127C-WIRE-06-ST01-DT06-DF01-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C127C-WIRE-06-ST01-DT06-DF01-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Has a heap buffer of size 128 within a struct. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the heap buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the heap buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127C-WIRE-06-ST01-DT06-DF01-CF24-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: export first 50 packets from saved pcap, run md5sum on newly created pcap Has a heap buffer of size 128 within a struct. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the heap buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the heap buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.environment_variable: This is probably not going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
